name: ALCHEMY unsTABLE
description:
Game made for Ludum Dare 49

You are running a small alchemy business in the middle of a magical forest

It all goes okay, but potions you sell are unstable and ready to explode every time they collide with real world entities like walls (or a cat)

Go to the customer to find out what ingredients she wants to mix into a potion. Then collect them from chests (and a well) on the level and put them one by one to the alchemy table at the top right corner of the level.

You can see ingredients that are on the table by going close to it. If the correct sequence of ingredients is broken, the table goes unstable and you need to put a stabilizer (bottom middle chest). And hurry up, because otherwise the table will explode and you will lose the customer

Try to sell as many magical potions as possible before losing three clients. Btw, ingredients the potions are made of are unstable too. Try not touch the walls with them

Controls:

 move with WASD 

rotate potion around you with left and right arrow buttons 

push and pull potion with up and down arrow buttons 

run on Shift

 interact on E

The game made with CocosCreator We used Spine, AdobePhotoshop for animation and art Audacity for audio editing
